---@class btApplyMap
local btApplyMap = {}

btApplyMap.classPath = {
    ["bt_ac_enter_scene_ani"] = "battle/behaviourApply/battle_frame/bt_ac_enter_scene_ani",
    ["bt_ac_round_test"]      = "battle/behaviourApply/battle_frame/bt_ac_round_test",
    ["bt_ac_ui_start_battle"] = "battle/behaviourApply/battle_frame/bt_ac_ui_start_battle",
}


function btApplyMap:getClass(className)
    if self.classPath and self.classPath[className] then
        return require_path(className, self.classPath[className])
    else
        Logger.Error("btApplyMap 文件 没有配置  ",className ," 数据 ")
    end
end

return btApplyMap
